message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this fantastic product. I'm open to offers, but I'm thinking around $150.  Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but my budget is limited. I am willing to pay up to $100 for the product. Let me know if this works for you!

Bob, thanks for your offer! While I appreciate your interest, $100 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $120, which would be a fair price for both of us. Let's see if we can make this work.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I understand your position, but given my budget constraints, I can only consider offers up to $90. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
